attributes.action: The BBC should remove its political bias from its entertainment programmes.
attributes.additional_details: If the BBC allows its entertainers to promote their biased view of politics then as a licence fee payer, I should be allowed to withdraw my financial support from this institution.
attributes.background: My licence fee is to support a public service, not a pseudo political party.

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.

You can make a complaint about the BBC here:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/

If you'd like the TV Licence fee to be abolished, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200239
